text: The Sheffield & Hallamshire Minor Cup was a county cup competition organised by the Sheffield & Hallamshire County Football Association from 1882 to 1896. ==Finals== {| class="wikitable" style=font-size:85% |- !Season !Winner !Score !Runner-up !Venue !Notes |- |1882–83 |align="right"|Heeley reserves |align="center"|3–1 |Lockwood Brothers reserves |Newhall | |- |1883–84 |align="right"|Attercliffe reserves |align="center"|2–0 |Heeley reserves |Queen's Ground | |- |1884–85 |align="right"|Attercliffe reserves |align="center"|6–1 |Clarence |Bramall Lane | |- |1885–86 |align="right"|Attercliffe reserves |align="center"|6–1 |Eckington Works |Newhall | |- |1886–87 |align="right"|Attercliffe reserves |align="center"|1–0 |Melville |Bramall Lane | |- |1887–88 |align="right"|Carbrook Church |align="center"|2–1 |Walkley |Bramall Lane | |- |1888–89 |align="right"|Ecclesfield reserves |align="center"|6–1 |Carbrook Church |Clifton Lane | |- |1889–90 |align="right"|Ecclesfield reserves |align="center"|2–1 |Melville |Bramall Lane | |- |1890–91 |align="right"|Wath |align="center"|3–2 |Heeley |Bramall Lane | |- |1891–92 |align="right"|Kiveton Park |align="center"|3–0 |Sheepbridge Works |Worksop | |- |1892–93 |align="right"|Pyebank Rovers |align="center"|2–1 |Heeley |Attercliffe | |- |1893–94 |align="right"|Pyebank Rovers |align="center"|3–1 |Ecclesfield |Woodhouse |League play-off final |- |1894–95 |align="right"|Wombwell Town |align="center"|4–0 |Rotherwood Rovers |Attercliffe |League play-off final |- |1895–96 |align="right"|Birdwell |align="center"|2–1 |North Staveley |Attercliffe |League play-off final |} ==See also== * Sheffield & Hallamshire County Cup * Sheffield & Hallamshire County Senior League * Sheffield & Hallamshire Senior Cup * Sheffield & Hallamshire Association Cup * Sheffield & Hallamshire Junior Cup ==References== Category:Sport in Sheffield Category:Defunct football competitions in South Yorkshire Category:County Cup competitions
title: Sheffield & Hallamshire Minor Cup
